test.description: Do all contigs have the correct number of mappings?
test.query: select C.contig_id,nreads,count(*) as mapping_count from CONTIG C, MAPPING M where C.contig_id=M.contig_id group by contig_id having nreads != mapping_count

test.format: Contig {0,number,#} created at {1,time} on {1,date}, length {2,number,#}bp, in project {3}, has nreads=0

test.query: select readname,hits from DUPLICATEREADS left join READINFO using(read_id)

test.description: Do all mappings correspond to contigs?
test.format: Mapping {0,number,#} for sequence {1,number,#} refers to non-existent contig {2,number,#}

test.description: Do all contig-to-sequence mappings have valid sequence data?
test.format: Mapping {1,number,#} in contig {0,number,#} has undefined sequence {2,number,#}

test.description: Do all mappings have a corresponding read?
test.query: select contig_id,mapping_id,MAPPING.seq_id from MAPPING left join (SEQ2READ,READINFO) on (MAPPING.seq_id = SEQ2READ.seq_id and SEQ2READ.read_id = READINFO.read_id) where readname is null
test.format: Mapping {1,number,#} in contig {0,number,#} has sequence {2,number,#} with undefined read

test.description: Do all sequences have quality clipping data?
test.format: Sequence {0,number,#} has no quality clipping data

test.description: Do all sequences have a corresponding sequence-to-read mapping?
test.format: Sequence {0,number,#} has no associated sequence-to-read mapping

test.description: Do all sequences with a sequence-to-read mapping have a valid read?
test.query: select SEQUENCE.seq_id,SEQ2READ.read_id from SEQUENCE left join (SEQ2READ,READINFO) on (SEQUENCE.seq_id = SEQ2READ.seq_id and SEQ2READ.read_id = READINFO.read_id) where readname is null and SEQ2READ.read_id is not null
test.format: Sequence {0,number,#} has no associated read (read_id is {1,number,#})

test.description: Do all reads have valid sequence data?
test.query: select READINFO.read_id,readname from READINFO left join (SEQ2READ,SEQUENCE) on (READINFO.read_id = SEQ2READ.read_id and SEQ2READ.seq_id = SEQUENCE.seq_id) where sequence is null or quality is null

Do all templates have a ligation?
Do all ligations have a clone?
